AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 29 Medical Record Technician Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 07, 2025, 14:06 IST
 All India Institute of Medical Science Delhi
 29 Jobs |  Posted On : 07-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 25,500 to 81,100




FOLLOW

The All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Delhi (AIIMS Delhi) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 29 Medical Record Technician posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass, 12th can apply for the AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Delhi.

AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Medical Record Technician	29	10th pass, 12th

AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 25,500/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 81,100/- per month.
How to Apply for the AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

Vishwesh Chaturvedi, Administrative Officer, Establishment section.

Important Dates:

Starting date	05-08-2025
Closing date	01-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
